GEELONG has completed the deal to sign star forward Jeremy Cameron from Greater Western Sydney in a deal completed in the dying seconds of the Trade Period.

articles.title: News Viewed Pies exodus continues with wingman now a Hawk Collingwood wingman Tom Phillips joins Hawthorn - AFL
articles.description: Collingwood wingman Tom Phillips joins Hawthorn
articles.content:
THE TRADE Period exodus at Collingwood has continued with wingman Tom Phillips traded to Hawthorn. 
Phillips was sent to the Hawks in exchange for a fourth-round selection (currently No.65).

articles.title: Tigers drop off Foxx hunt after Storm deny Addo-Carr release - NRL.COM
articles.description: Josh Addo-Carr has been denied a release by Melbourne from the final year of contract, ending the Wests Tigers' bid to get him to their club for 2021.
articles.content:
Josh Addo-Carr has been denied a release by Melbourne from the final year of contract, ending the Wests Tigers' bid to get him to their club for 2021.
